query:
SELECT
                s.id,
                s.title,
                s.cover_image_url,
                s.updated_at,
                s.last_chapter_found_in_storage,
                sc.title as chapter_title
            FROM
                user_bookmarks ub
            JOIN
                series s ON ub.series_id = s.id
            LEFT JOIN
                series_chapters sc ON s.id = sc.series_id
                AND s.last_chapter_found_in_storage = sc.chapter_number
            WHERE
                ub.user_id = $1
            ORDER BY
                s.updated_at DESC
